text: Dennis W. Day (July 12, 1942 â€” July 17, 2018) was an American actor, singer, dancer and theater director. He was best known as one of the original cast members of The Mickey Mouse Club. After ending his career as a child actor, he went on to work as a theater director before relocating to Oregon in the 1980s. Day disappeared in July 2018 and was found dead several months later at his home in Phoenix, Oregon. A roommate was charged with his death in 2019. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American crime victims Category:American dancers Category:American movie actors Category:American child actors Category:American television actors Category:Disney people Category:Gay men Category:LGBT directors Category:LGBT actors Category:LGBT dancers Category:People from Ashland, Oregon Category:Actors from Las Vegas Category:Actors from Oregon
title: Dennis Day (Mouseketeer)
